article_node.title: Undiscovered Gems In The Middle East To Explore This September 2025
article_node.summary: Gulf markets are retreating amid falling oil prices, prompting investors to seek small‑cap opportunities in the region. A list of 201 “undiscovered gems” highlights companies such as Emirates Insurance Company P.J.S.C, which has modest earnings growth and a recent dividend cut, and Emirates Reem Investments Company P.J.S.C, which boasts strong earnings momentum and a healthy balance sheet. The article suggests that these firms could offer value‑oriented upside despite broader market weakness, especially as investors look for resilient, growth‑oriented small caps in the Middle East.
